title: Joeyp
author: Joeyp
content: Search Bitcoin ATM (Automated Teller Machine), which allows to buy and sell ( 40% from total ATM ) Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies using cash in 70 countries.Link: https://coinatmradar.com/

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: This is not new on this forum. Bitcoin ATM transaction fee is too expensive for me. For high amount of money, it will require identity verification. For small amount of money, it will require phone number verification. This will not be good for people that prefer decentralized exchanges and also the transaction fee is expensive.

They are not so experienced for decentralized exchanges etc. Do you really think that you are providing them a service by publishing this topic with two lines and a link to a website? There are dozens of topics that touched on Bitcoin ATMs, and as far as I remember, there were those who were offering the service of selling these machines to anyone who wanted to install them. comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Joeyp on October 17, 2023, 06:22:22 PMQuote from: _act_ on October 17, 2023, 06:17:04 PMThis is not new on this forum. Bitcoin ATM transaction fee is too expensive for me. For high amount of money, it will require identity verification. For small amount of money, it will require phone number verification. This will not be good for people that prefer decentralized exchanges and also the transaction fee is expensive.This is Beginners & Help board, where people from various countries look how to buy some Bitcoins. They are not so experienced for decentralized exchanges etc. We have the responsibility to give newbies the right information. I don't think anybody needs a special lecture to understand or use decentralised exchanges. It is even simpler to use Dex than Cex, therefore newbies should be encouraged to use decentralised exchanges. Bitcoin ATMs charge high transaction fees, they ask for KYC and they are not dependable. Just as normal bank ATMs suffer from network issues, bitcoin ATMs can also suffer from service problems. These ATMs can also negatively affect the privacy and security of users because everybody will know you own bitcoin if they see you use it.
